Most competitive FPS of all time. Terrible experience if you're a free to play player. Non-Prime people are cheating their ass off 90% of the time so if you want to have an enjoyable experience do yourself a favor and buy the Prime Status Upgrade (You can also achieve Prime Status for free when you get to rank 21 but with the current XP system it will take you around 2 months of Non-Prime matchmaking and belive me, with the ammount of cheating there paying 13,25€ for the Prime Status Upgrade is kind of a no brainer).
